UserSignup.Title: Welcome To Coupons4Giving
UserSignup.Subject: Welcome to Coupons4Giving!
UserSignup.UserContent: Thanks for registering with Coupons4Giving. Once you login to your account you can start supporting your favorite causes and purchasing great deals from a wide range of merchants and E-tailers (online only merchants).
UserSignup.NPOContent: Thanks for registering with Coupons4Giving. Once you login to your account you can get started. You can set up a campaign and start fundraising, and you can support your favorite causes by purchasing great deals from a wide range of Merchants and E-Tailers (online-only merchants).
UserSignup.MerchantContent: Thanks for registering with Coupons4Giving. Once you login to your account you can get started. You can set up merchant offers to support your favourite Not-For-Profits, and you can support your favorite causes by purchasing great deals from a wide range of Merchants and E-Tailers (online-only merchants).
